text: @realDonaldTrump I’m still baffled by the Ban’s-1/30 yet THOUSANDS still get in USA & then March 15 soon to be ZERO BUT USA GETS ROCKED W/COVID19 CASES,THAT IS 4wks?? WE’R TOLD 2wks is when ur sick if not in 5days u become very ill?? So HOWS THAT BAN WORK?just admit err’s & we back off,
